courseDetails.title: Chatbot for Beginner: Create an AI Chatbot without Coding
courseDetails.shortDescription: Complete Step By Step Guide On How To Create AI Chatbot with No Code For Begineers
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you still creating a chatbot with tiresome coding? Doesn’t that take up all of your time and leave you exhausted?

Are you ready to supercharge your customer service experience with an AI chatbot?


Instead, why don’t you try the easy way to help your business save so much time, effort and money? We have created a step-by-step guide to build the perfect no-code chatbot in less than 10 minutes. Creating a chatbot has never been easier.


You don’t need a Ph.D. in computer science or coding experience to get started. With advances in natural language processing, you can create your own AI Chatbot right now.

Creating a GPT chatbot makes customer service easier and more efficient, allowing customers to get the answers they need quickly and conveniently. Plus, it’s fun to watch your chatbot come alive!

I’ll walk you through the steps of creating your own AI chatbot without any coding experience. We’ll discuss what AI Chatbot is and why it’s so useful, plus how to set up your own AI chatbot from scratch with no coding skills required.

By the end of this Video, you’ll be ready to start creating powerful AI-driven customer service experiences for your business


Whether you’re a small business, freelancer, e-commerce store owner, a startup, or a large corporation — you don’t need coding experience to create your own AI Chatbot! In fact, all you really need is access to the right tools and technology.


Benefits of Using an AI Chatbot

AI Chatbots are all the rage these days and having one of your own can be a major advantage for your business. Whether you’re looking to automate customer service or create an interactive database for internal use, AI Chatbot can help you achieve that with ease.

First off, leveraging an AI Chatbot allows you to save time and money, as they don’t require any coding experience or knowledge to get up and running.

All you need to do is provide basic information such as the language the bot should understand, the type of questions it should answer, and any other commands you want it to carry out. This makes AI Chatbots incredibly efficient and easy to use.

Not only that, but AI Chatbots are also incredibly adaptable; they can quickly learn from customer conversations, identify patterns in customer queries, and suggest actions accordingly.

That means customers will receive a more tailored experience every time they engage with your bot — something that just isn’t possible with manual human labour.

So if you’re looking for an efficient way to streamline customer service without having to hire coders or take on massive amounts of development projects, then creating your own AI Chatbot might be the perfect solution!


Why do you need to create a chatbot for your business?

Creating and deploying an AI-powered chatbot for your business brings a lot of benefits to the table. Here are a few of them:

24/7 support availability

A chatbot prevents losing a customer by providing instant support outside business hours. Without it, customers would have to wait for fixed-schedule agents, leading to potential abandonment.

‍Lower costs

Using chatbots can significantly reduce your customer support costs and overheads by automating tasks and screening calls, potentially decreasing call duration. Studies reveal that AI-powered chatbots can decrease customer support costs by 30%.

‍No language barrier

Chatbots break down language barriers and enable global outreach by supporting 50+ languages. With a multilingual chatbot, you can scale localization without increasing the agent count.

Improved lead generation

Lead-generation chatbots are more effective than big, clunky forms that can be intimidating and time-consuming. Chatbots present questions one at a time, reducing the effort required to fill them out.

‍Increased conversion rate

An intelligent chatbot can boost conversion rates by providing instant answers to customers' product queries. Shopify stores can use conversion triggers like discounts and offers to engage customers and reduce cart abandonment.


You don’t need coding experience to build your own AI chatbot! With the right AI tools, you can create an expert-level AI Chatbot that can understand natural language and seamlessly converse with humans.



Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your career prospects, expand your skill set, or simply satisfy your curiosity.

ENROLL NOW & Embark on a journey towards AI Mastery. Remember, excellence is a journey, not a destination.
targetAudiences: Business owner who want to create an AI chatbot for their Website
Travel companies could use a chatbot to book flights and hotels
Ecommerce Owner Who Want To Increase sales
e-commerce businesses could use a chatbot to provide customer service and answer questions about products

Store large number of records

Quick and easy to find information


RDBMS TERMINOLOGY


Column   as Attribute 

Row as Entity Instance

Table as Entity

AlternateKey as UniqueKey



RELATIONSHIPS Cardinality

90% of the tables in database will be linked with another tables.

10%of the tables will be independent.

There are three types of relationships between tables

one to one

one to many

many to many


Tables can have a single / multiple relationships or may not have relationships.


Structured data - 2 dimensional data Rows,Columns


PrimaryKey in one table will be given as ForiegnKey in another table to build relationship.


DATA MODELING

RDBMS

PrimaryKey & ForiegnKey with relationship between them.

1 to 1 - any PrimaryKey can become ForiegnKey


1 to many employees in a department

PK of parent table will be FK in child table


Department table Deptid(PK),DeptName,

Employees Table  Empid,EmpName,DeptId(FK)


many to many(students and teachers,patients & doctors,Hospital & Doctors)(TeacherId,TeacherName)(StudentId,StudentName,TeacherId)

Patient Table(PatientNo(PK),PatientName,Adress),

Patient Doctor Table()

courseDetails.title: Software Tester Course - Become an Effective Tester
courseDetails.shortDescription: Project & Job based Tester/QA Engineer Course. Manual Software Testing, Agile with JIRA, SQL for Testers & Interviews.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you aspiring to break into IT / Software Testing / QA through an effective and professional course?

The key objective of this Software Tester Course is to learn Manual Testing and Agile Testing from a project perspective while using a job oriented approach. This would effectively help those aspiring to break into IT / Software Testing. This is an intense Software Testing Training Course, conducted to offer practical knowledge in Software Testing.

Learn Test Panning, Test Analysis, Test Design, Test Implementation, Test Execution and Test Reporting in a professional way.

Learn Software Tester's Key responsibilities:

  • Analyse Business requirements and Design specifications.

  • Derive Test Conditions based on test analysis

  • Identify Test Data Requirements for Test Scenarios.

  • Develop detailed test cases based on business requirements and design specification.

  • Define test data by applying formal Test Case Design techniques.

  • Prepare test traceability matrix to attain adequate test coverage.

  • Peer review detailed test cases and log review comments.

  • Perform functional test case execution as per test plan and approach defined.

  • Conduct Exploratory testing by applying session based test management technique.

  • Report bugs and demonstrate effective bug hunting techniques.

  • Communicate status of testing tasks by collecting metrics & prepare test status report

Learn Manual/QA/Agile Testing from a Testing Industry expert and from a project perspective while using a realistic & hands-on approach. Grasp how to effectively work on Testing projects aligning to industry standards and expectations.

Become competent in facing practical testing interviews.

In addition to that, SQL for Testers & Intro to Automation Testing are added additional content (sessions) for this realistic Software Tester Course!

Note: This is NOT an automation testing course, however this helps in progressing to become an automation tester - since you would gain a robust exposure and solid understanding of project-based software testing.

Become an effective Software Tester, good luck!

¡Bienvenido al Curso de Angular Consultas a API REST, Desde Cero Absoluto!


Descripción del curso:

Angular es un popular framework de desarrollo de aplicaciones web que permite crear interfaces de usuario dinámicas y escalables. En este curso, te introducirás en los conceptos básicos de Angular y aprenderás cómo realizar consultas a una API REST para obtener y manipular datos en tu aplicación.


En este curso veremos como maquetar una página web desde cero absoluto, para pasar luego al desarrollo con Angular.

No se preocupen, no se necesita experiencia en programación.


Además voy a estar enseñándoles a mejorar su perfil de LinkedIn, y a crear una página de inicio super atractiva para Github.


Más hacía el final del curso, veremos cómo crear un portfolio y subirlo a  la web gratis.


Pero el tema central será consumir datos de una API REST, en realidad 2 o más.


Aprenderán a usar Angular desde CLI y verán lo sencillo que resulta todo, con un poco de práctica. Este no es otro curso de 60hs que no vas a terminar. En 10hs aproximadamente veremos todos los temas.


¡Prepárate para adentrarte en el desarrollo de aplicaciones web con Angular y aprender cómo realizar consultas a una API REST para obtener y manipular datos de manera eficiente!


Nos vemos adentro.


Alejandro G Vera, Programador web FullStack
